content:
Ah, let me explain...
There's turbulence occurring somewhere at sea,
which is causing unusual cloud and fog formations.
info: 生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本

content:
...Eco... Eh?!
What am I doing here again...
info: 生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本

content:
Just like the creatures you've worked so hard to collect,
we live here too, sharing the same ecosystem.
Our very existence is a form of ecological vitality.
info: 生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本

content: There's a spiral-shaped light!
info: 生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本

content:
Hoho, don't worry, it's nothing dangerous.
We just need to figure out how to fix what the chaos flow affected,
but... somehow it seems even weirder now.
info: 生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本

content:
So, what do you have in mind?
<color=#8AAB4B>Food</color>, <color=#8AAB4B>clothing</color>,
<color=#8AAB4B>furniture</color> and such...
info: 生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本

content:
Got it! I'm on my way~! Right away!
I wonder if there's anything fun
hidden in the mist!
info: 生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本

content: Looks like Sani's investigation is starting to get pretty exciting, hoho!
info: 生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本

content:
Hohoho,
Before heading out, please make sure to complete
the pending maintenance work at the Camp...
info: 生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本
生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本
生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本

content:
That's right! When you were making the ecosphere,
I figured out why there's mist over the sea!
It's coming from the southeast...
info: 生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本

content:
Huh—?
Well, fine— can't be helped—!
I'll go get ready—!
info: 生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本
生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本

content:
I apologize,
Sani is extremely curious about these kinds of situations,
so she tends to get a bit... overexcited.
info: 生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本

content:
Earlier, I asked everyone what they liked,
so we could put it in the ecosphere.
Then Glenn gave me an apple - it was his favorite.
info: 生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本

content:
I hope this gives you some inspiration.
Feel free to hand it over when you're ready,
No rush at all.
info: 生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本

content:
Please choose a <color=#8AAB4B>favorite</color> item to put in the terrarium,
Hoho~ If you're not sure what to put in,
Please accept these gifts from me...
info: 生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本

content:
Frostia brought an umbrella, as she usually does.
Sani brought a wrench... understandable.
As for me, I guess I still want to put a teacup in there...
info: 生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本

content:
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, you're amazing!
I mean, you just learned how to use a fishing rod and those other tools? You'll be more capable than me soon~!
info: 生态调研-户外摆放创想卡_主流程文本

content: Hoho! Special thanks to you, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, this wouldn't have gone so smoothly without you.
